feature1.explanation: Both texts use hyphens and periods as end punctuation, showing consistency in punctuation style.

feature2.explanation: Both texts exhibit similar lexical and grammatical features, using common vocabulary and grammatical structures.

feature3.explanation: Both texts are relatively short and straightforward in sentence structure, maintaining coherence and cohesion.

feature4.explanation: Texts do not share narrative style or common expressions, indicating some differences in tone and mood.

feature5.explanation: No spelling or typographical errors were found in either text, suggesting a similar level of attention to detail.

overall.explanation: Considering the combination of features analyzed, the likelihood of the two texts being written by the same author is moderate to high.
